segments.text: Mark , you've been coming home late these days . What are you busy doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nothing important . I've been working overtime lately .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many hours do you work each day now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's tough indeed ! Do you think your health can afford ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't care . I need money .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Surely you'll be paid extra for overtime , but do you think it's really worth ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think so . When I work overtime I'm paid time and a half .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes . Money comes faster in that way than otherwise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But jobs with a lot of overtime are quite limited . Employers usually don't like to pay for overtime if they can manage .
segments.speaker: S2
